## Type of Change

- [ ] New documentation page
- [ ] Update existing documentation
- [ ] Fix (typo, broken link, incorrect info)
- [ ] Structural change (sidebar, navigation)

## Checklist

- [ ] Frontmatter complete (title, owner, last_review, classification)
- [ ] Spell check passes (`npx cspell "docs/**/*.md"`)
- [ ] Renders correctly locally (`npm start`)
- [ ] Code examples tested and working
- [ ] No sensitive data (API keys, costs, internal URLs)
- [ ] Images in `static/img/` with descriptive names
